tasks.label: Build Jurassic Pixels Test (Debug)
tasks.command: if not exist bin mkdir bin & call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\BuildTools\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars64.bat" && cl.exe /Fe:bin/jurassic_pixels_test.exe /Iinclude /EHsc /std:c++17 /Zi /DEBUG tests/jurassic_pixels_test.cpp src/engine/*.cpp src/qube/QubeRuntime.cpp src/agents/*.cpp src/safety/*.cpp
tasks.detail: Builds the Jurassic Pixels unit verification test using MSVC cl.exe with debug info.
